```
[global]
    load printers = yes
    passdb backend = tdbsam
    security = user
    cups options = raw
    workgroup = YOUR_DOMAIN_NAME
    printcap name = cups
    printing = cups
    os level = 20
    netbios name = SERVER1
    browseable = yes

    interfaces = lo eth0 192.168.1.0/24
    hosts allow = 127\. 192.168.1.
```

```
[printers]
        comment = All Printers
        path = /var/tmp
        printable = yes
        create mask = 0600
        browseable = no

[print$]
        comment = Printer Drivers
        path = /var/lib/samba/drivers
        write list = @printadmin root
        force group = @printadmin
        create mask = 0664
        directory mask = 0775
```

```
[homes]
    comment = Home Directories
    browseable = no
    writeable = yes
;   valid users = %S
;   valid users = MYDOMAIN\%S
```

```
[Facilities]
    create mode = 0660
    writeable = yes
    path = /opt/facilities
    comment = Facilities Group Share
    directory mode = 0770
    only user = yes
    valid users = @facilities
    browseable = yes
```
